description:
An update on the Apache Software Foundation and an overview of its projects. A quick look at how the ASF works and the key events affecting the foundation in recent history.

 
Speakers
Shane Curcuru
VP, Brand Management, The Apache Software Foundation
Shane serves as Vice President of Brand Management for the ASF, setting policy for trademarks and branding across all 200+ Apache projects and podlings, and has served as five-time Director. Shane regularly talks and blogs about branding and governance issues for open source projects.
short_description: An update on the Apache Software Foundation and an overview of its projects. A quick look at how the ASF works and the key event
title: State of the Feather
